price: when their brother Lot said to them, “Will you not fear Allah?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūna
